title: Nervous System Mastery
subtitle: Regulate Your System, Expand Your Capacity
description: A 6-module course on understanding and working with your autonomic nervous system. Learn to recognize your states, regulate when activated, and build greater capacity for life's challenges.

modules.title: Understanding Your Nervous System
modules.description: The science of your autonomic nervous system and why it matters

modules.title: Mapping Your Patterns
modules.description: Identifying your unique nervous system responses

modules.title: Down-Regulating
modules.description: Tools for calming an activated system

modules.title: Up-Regulating
modules.description: Tools for energizing a shutdown system

modules.title: Building Capacity
modules.description: Expanding your window of tolerance over time

modules.title: Integration & Daily Practice
modules.description: Creating a sustainable nervous system practice

whatYouLearn: Understand how your autonomic nervous system works
Recognize the signs of activation and shutdown
Use practical tools to regulate your state
Build greater capacity for stress and intensity
Create a daily practice for nervous system health
requirements: Willingness to pay attention to body sensations
A quiet space for practicing regulation techniques
Openness to experimenting with different approaches

questions.question: What are the three main states of the autonomic nervous system according to Polyvagal Theory?
What is the 'window of tolerance'?
options: How much pain you can handle
The zone where you can experience emotions without becoming dysregulated
The amount of time you can meditate

questions.question: When might you need to 'up-regulate' your nervous system?
Which practice is most effective for activating the parasympathetic (calming) response?
What does 'building capacity' mean in nervous system work?
options: Expanding your window of tolerance over time

questions.question: What is co-regulation?
options: Using another person's nervous system to help regulate your own
Breathing at the same rate as someone else
